SEARCH
程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.service

接口 BudgetService

所有已知实现类:
BudgetServiceImpl
public interface BudgetService
BudgetService interface provides methods for managing user budgets, checking budget status, and calculating budget-related statistics.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型

    getLeftDays(String userId)
    Gets the number of days left in the current month for a user.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addBudget

      void addBudget(Budget budget)
      Adds a new budget.
      参数:
      budget - the budget to add

    • updateBudget

      void updateBudget(Budget budget)
      Updates an existing budget.
      参数:
      budget - the budget to update

    • removeBudget

      void removeBudget(String budgetId)
      Removes a budget by its ID.
      参数:
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to remove

    • isBudgetExceeded

      boolean isBudgetExceeded(Budget budget) throws ServiceException
      Checks if the budget is exceeded.
      参数:
      budget - the budget to check
      返回:
      true if the budget is exceeded, false otherwise
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during the check

    • isAlertBudget

      boolean isAlertBudget(Budget budget) throws ServiceException
      Checks if the budget is in alert status (close to being exceeded).
      参数:
      budget - the budget to check
      返回:
      true if the budget is in alert status, false otherwise
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during the check

    • getBudgetsByUserId

      List<Budget> getBudgetsByUserId(String userId)
      Retrieves all budgets associated with a specific user ID.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      a list of budgets belonging to the user

    • getBudgetByCategory

      Budget getBudgetByCategory(String userId, String category)
      Retrieves a budget by user ID and category.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      category - the budget category
      返回:
      the budget for the specified category, or null if not found

    • getTotalBudget

      double getTotalBudget(String userId)
      Gets the total budget amount for a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the total budget amount

    • getTotalSpent

      double getTotalSpent(String userId) throws ServiceException
      Gets the total amount spent by a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the total spent amount
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • getMonthlySpent

      double getMonthlySpent(String userId) throws ServiceException
      Gets the total amount spent by a user in the current month.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the monthly spent amount
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • getTotalAlertCount

      int getTotalAlertCount(String userId) throws ServiceException
      Gets the total number of budgets that have triggered an alert for a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the number of alert budgets
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • getDailyAvailableBudget

      double getDailyAvailableBudget(String userId) throws ServiceException
      Gets the available daily budget for a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the daily available budget
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs during calculation

    • getLeftDays

      int getLeftDays(String userId)
      Gets the number of days left in the current month for a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      返回:
      the number of days left

    • getTotalBudgetByCategory

      double getTotalBudgetByCategory(String userId, String category)
      Gets the total budget amount for a specific category for a user.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      category - the budget category
      返回:
      the total budget amount for the category

    • getTotalSpentByCategory

      double getTotalSpentByCategory(String userId, String category) throws ServiceException
      Gets the total amount spent by a user in a specific category.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      category - the budget category
      返回:
      the total spent amount for the category
      抛出:
